title: Warden

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Patrol at night, preventing your prisoner from escaping (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, a random REF player will become your prisoner. They gain a night chat with you and is roleblocked through immunity each night, as well as losing access to their factional chat
- Your prisoner has a one use ability called Prison Break. They may spend the night to use this ability
- If you patrol on a night your prisoner attempts to escape, you will lock them back up and sentence them to the death penalty. The following day, their name and role will be exposed to the entire town
- If your prisoner manages to escape, they will stab you with a makeshift shiv and regain access to their factional chat. At least you tried
- If you die at night, your prisoner escapes
Destiny: Catch your prisoner and sentence them to the death penalty

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their destiny
